title: Staff of the Ram
content:
the spiral-horned creatures that gave the weapon its name. Quarterstaff Versatile 1.8 480

Staff of the Ram

Versatile - Wielding With Both Hands

1d8 (1d6)+2 Bludgeoning+ 1d4 Force

Staff of the Ram: Once per tum, the blow possibly knocks a foe back 2m and Stuns them. This has no effect on dragons or Huge creatures.

Weapon Enchantment +2

Main Hand OnlyTopple

Fashioned by some unknown archmage - no identifying insignia is forthcoming. The staff thrums with a slow, ferocious pulse that draws i
